chalo chale mann sapano ke ganv me
apni amma aur apni joru ki sar pe hath rakhke
kahi apni ummido ka koi phul na murajhaaye
ithalaate huye lehraate huye tarsate huye
jisko abhi sadiyo tak ye khel rachana hai
buddhi ke chakkar me tu kayeko kayeko kayeko padela
dhani chunari pahan
bolo subah sham hare krishna hare ram
apni mehki huyi zulfo ka sahara de de
ankhiyo me rainaa gayi nindiyaa na aai
apani jaan bachaa lo baabu varanaa dibbaa gul hai
dil tute ho sath chhute phir bhi tu pichhe aaye, ha
ek dil aur sau afsane, haye mohabbat haye zamane
sunke teri pukar, sang chalae ko tere koi ho na ho taiyar
macha diya shor
aaj jo sar ko jhukaayaa to mujhe yaad aayaa
aa jayenge jab apni par taaro ko tod ke layenge
jin aankho me paani na ho
daftar me chhuti ho to mat hona gum se bojhal
sabki udaye khilli sohar bahar sher bane par
ngamo ki masti hai meri jawani me
dhire se jana khatiyan o khatmal
hakumat hai meri dariya samundar or kinaro par
na daregi na rukegi, dekhe kya ho kaha dil ne
yahi neeli si ankhon wale
kabhi aar kabhi paar laga tir-e-najar
re mit na milaa re man kaa
aate hi mast bahaaro ke dulhan ki tarah har khet saje,
ja re ja footpath pe tujhko ho ho
muthukodi kawadi hada amma
sakta ek din to pachhatana hai
phir bhi yeh naam honthon pe na ho
inkaa bholaapan miltaa hai, sabko baanh pasaare
koi patthar se naa mare mere divane ko
koi shahar is naam ka
han han ji maine dekha dekha ji maine dekha
off ho chhodo na jamana to hai noakr biwi ka
jaise kaali ghata baharo me
mere sajna teri zindgani rahe, zindgani rahe
ek do teen char raju dada ke chele hoshiyar
oye hoye
ek rupaiya bhada, paisenjar itna jada
pyaar ki qasam, sag rahege ham nil gagan ki chhaanv me
kitna badal gaya inasan
lakh ladi main apne jee se
ek tu hi man ko hai bhayi sajana
kahte hai ki gaalib ka hai andaaz-e-bayan aur
jhume laharae, nayana mil jaye nain se
